key.info: Define which property should be used for time key.

label.info: Define which property should be used for label.

color.info: Which property to use for the color

select.info: Define a variable that stores the selection of this timeline.

horizontal.info: Whether to show the timeline horizontally.

waitingForInputMessage.info: Text to display while waiting for input.

waitingForDataMessage.info: Text to display while waiting for data.
